sen.j: 元禄大判（げんろくおおばん）とは元禄8年（1695年）11月に慶長大判についで発行された大判である。
sen.e: Genroku-Oban refers to a large-sized gold coin released in November 1695 following Keicho-Oban.
Genroku-Oban refers to a large-sized gold coin issued in November 1695 following the issuing of the Keicho-Oban.

sen.j: 元禄8年（1695年）9月の元禄の吹替え（改鋳）による元禄小判および元禄丁銀の発行に伴い、大判も品位を下げて発行され、鋳造は元禄金銀と伴に専ら江戸本郷 (文京区)霊雲寺近くの大根畑に建てられた吹所で行われた。
sen.e: As Genroku-Koban (gold coin smaller than the Oban) and Genroku-Chogin (silver coin) were released according to the Genroku's currency reform of September 1695, the Oban was issued with its content of gold decreased and its minting took place together with that of Genroku gold and silver mainly at a minting place built in a radish field near Ryoun-ji Temple in Hongo, Edo (Bunkyo-ku Ward, Tokyo).
sen.cmt: 大判についての話なので、元禄「小判」について（ ）に少し補足。（文京区）の訳に江戸の対訳として東京を補足した。吹所の定訳が不明。 大判小判の「品位を下げる」とはコインの質ではなくて金の分量を下げるということなので、quality loweredではない訳にした。他の文章も同様にしています。
sen.e: As Genroku-Koban (a gold coin smaller than the Oban) and Genroku-Chogin (silver coin) were released according to the Genroku's currency reforms of September 1695, the Oban was issued with a decreased gold content and its minting was mainly done at a minting place built in a radish field near Ryoun-ji Temple in Hongo, Edo (Bunkyo-ku Ward, Tokyo) where Genroku gold and silver was also processed.
sen.cmt: 意味をよりわかりやすくするために変えました。

sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 表面は「拾両後藤（花押）」と墨書され、後藤十代廉乗および十一代通乗の書であり、上下左右に丸枠桐極印がそれぞれ一箇所、計四箇所打たれ、形状は角ばった楕円形である。
sen.e: It had the letters "ju-ryo (ten-ryo) GOTO (written seal mark)" written with indian-ink by Kenjo GOTO the tenth and Tsujo the eleventh on its surface, and it was an angular, oval coin with a hallmark of paulownia in a circle each on the upper, lower, left and right parts of it.

sen.j: 裏面には「元」の年代印が打たれることを特徴とするが、品位が低下された小判および丁銀にしばしばこの年代印が見られるのに対し、大判としてはこの元禄大判の年代印が唯一のものである。
sen.e: It was characterized by the engraved mark of "Gen" (the first letter of the word Genroku era) on its back, making itself the only coin bearing such a mark among other Oban coins, while this kind of mark could often be seen on Kobans and Chogin silvers whose contents of gold were decreased.

sen.j: 二割以上の品位低下にも拘らず慶長大判との引換は1%の増歩しか付けられず、また、元禄大判の相場は元禄小判に対し、含有金量では九両一分に相当したが、相場は七両二分程度であった。
sen.e: Although its content of gold was decreased by more than 20 percent, the amount of this new Oban after Keicho-Oban in circulation was increased by only one percent, and also, when compared with Genroku-Koban, the content of gold in the Oban was equivalent to nine-ryo one-bu and its market price was as much as seven-ryo two-bu.
sen.cmt: 単位については説明を補足していません。
sen.e: Although its content of gold was decreased by more than 20 percent, the price was only 1 percent lower from the Keicho Oban, and when compared with Genroku-Koban, the content of gold in the Oban was equivalent to nine-ryo one-bu and its market price was as much as seven-ryo two-bu.
